### 🎯 Hosting

I used [`vercel`](https://vercel.com) as hosting and the technologies below build this website.  
1️⃣ [Tailwind](https://tailwindcss.com/)  
2️⃣ [Font Awesome](https://fontawesome.com)  
3️⃣ [Astro](https://astro.build)
